snippet.title: Potion Lore: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Throw Professor Stange's magic potions to help guide him through a dark, treacherous castle and recover the stolen potion lore. Coming this summer to Windows Phone 7.

Follow us for updates!
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/HexfireSoftware
Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/hexfiresoftware
